metadata.title: CVE-2025-0245 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: Under certain circumstances, a user opt-in setting that Focus shouldrequire authentication before use could have been be bypassed. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 134.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
